#include <string>
#include <sstream>
#include "targets/type_checker.h"
#include "targets/postfix_writer.h"
#include "targets/frame_size_calculator.h"
#include "ast/all.h"  // all.h is automatically generated
#include "fir_parser.tab.h"

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_nil_node(cdk::nil_node * const node, int lvl) {
  // EMPTY
}
void fir::postfix_writer::do_data_node(cdk::data_node * const node, int lvl) {
  // EMPTY
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_not_node(cdk::not_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->argument()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.INT(0); std::cout << "INT(0)" << std::endl;
  _pf.EQ(); std::cout << "EQ()" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_and_node(cdk::and_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  int lbl = ++_lbl;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.DUP32(); std::cout << "DUP32()" << std::endl;
  _pf.JZ(mklbl(lbl)); std::cout << "JZ(mklbl(lbl))" << std::endl;
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.AND(); std::cout << "AND()" << std::endl;
  _pf.ALIGN(); std::cout << "ALIGN()" << std::endl;
  _pf.LABEL(mklbl(lbl)); std::cout << "LABEL(mklbl(lbl))" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_or_node(cdk::or_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  int lbl = ++_lbl;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.DUP32(); std::cout << "DUP32()" << std::endl;
  _pf.JNZ(mklbl(lbl)); std::cout << "JNZ(mklbl(lbl))" << std::endl;
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.OR(); std::cout << "OR()" << std::endl;
  _pf.ALIGN(); std::cout << "ALIGN()" << std::endl;
  _pf.LABEL(mklbl(lbl)); std::cout << "LABEL(mklbl(lbl))" << std::endl;
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_sequence_node(cdk::sequence_node * const node, int lvl) {
  for (size_t i = 0; i < node->size(); i++) {
    node->node(i)->accept(this, lvl);
  }
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_integer_node(cdk::integer_node * const node, int lvl) {
  if (_inFunctionBody) {
    _pf.INT(node->value()); std::cout << "INT(node->value())" << std::endl;
  } else {
    _pf.SINT(node->value()); std::cout << "SINT(node->value())" << std::endl;
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_double_node(cdk::double_node * const node, int lvl) {
  if (_inFunctionBody) {
    _pf.DOUBLE(node->value()); std::cout << "DOUBLE(node->value())" << std::endl;
  } else {
    _pf.SDOUBLE(node->value()); std::cout << "SDOUBLE(node->value())" << std::endl;
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_string_node(cdk::string_node * const node, int lvl) {
  int lbl1;

  /* generate the string */
  _pf.RODATA(); std::cout << "RODATA()" << std::endl; // strings are DATA readonly
  _pf.ALIGN(); std::cout << "ALIGN()" << std::endl; // make sure we are aligned
  _pf.LABEL(mklbl(lbl1 = ++_lbl)); std::cout << "LABEL(mklbl(lbl1 = ++_lbl))" << std::endl; // give the string a name
  _pf.SSTRING(node->value()); std::cout << "SSTRING(node->value())" << std::endl; // output string characters

  if (_function) {
    _pf.TEXT(); std::cout << "TEXT()" << std::endl;
    _pf.ADDR(mklbl(lbl1)); std::cout << "ADDR(mklbl(lbl1))" << std::endl;
  } else {
    _pf.DATA(); std::cout << "DATA()" << std::endl;
    _pf.SADDR(mklbl(lbl1)); std::cout << "SADDR(mklbl(lbl1))" << std::endl;
  }
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_neg_node(cdk::neg_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->argument()->accept(this, lvl); // determine the value
  _pf.NEG(); std::cout << "NEG()" << std::endl; // 2-complement
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_add_node(cdk::add_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE && node->left()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) {
    _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;
  } else if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_POINTER) {
    // TODO check thiiiis
    _pf.INT(3); std::cout << "INT(3)" << std::endl;
    _pf.SHTL(); std::cout << "SHTL()" << std::endl;
  }

  node->right()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE && node->right()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) {
    _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;
  } else if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_POINTER && node->right()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) {
    _pf.INT(3); std::cout << "INT(3)" << std::endl;
    _pf.SHTL(); std::cout << "SHTL()" << std::endl;
  }

  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE) {
    _pf.DADD(); std::cout << "DADD()" << std::endl;
  }
  else {
    _pf.ADD(); std::cout << "ADD()" << std::endl;
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_sub_node(cdk::sub_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  node->left()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE && node->left()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;

  node->right()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE && node->right()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) {
    _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;
  } else if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_POINTER && node->right()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) {
    _pf.INT(3); std::cout << "INT(3)" << std::endl;
    _pf.SHTL(); std::cout << "SHTL()" << std::endl;
  }

  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE) {
    _pf.DSUB(); std::cout << "DSUB()" << std::endl;
  } else {
    _pf.SUB(); std::cout << "SUB()" << std::endl;
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_mul_node(cdk::mul_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE && node->left()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;

  node->right()->accept(this, lvl);
  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE && node->right()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;

  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE) {
    _pf.DMUL(); std::cout << "DMUL()" << std::endl;
  } else {
    _pf.MUL(); std::cout << "MUL()" << std::endl;
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_div_node(cdk::div_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE && node->left()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;

  node->right()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE && node->right()->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_INT) _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;

  if (node->type()->name() == cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE) {
    _pf.DDIV(); std::cout << "DDIV()" << std::endl;
  } else {
    _pf.DIV(); std::cout << "DIV()" << std::endl;
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_mod_node(cdk::mod_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.MOD(); std::cout << "MOD()" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_lt_node(cdk::lt_node * const node, int lvl) {
  // TODO DMCP?
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.LT(); std::cout << "LT()" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_le_node(cdk::le_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.LE(); std::cout << "LE()" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_ge_node(cdk::ge_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.GE(); std::cout << "GE()" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_gt_node(cdk::gt_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.GT(); std::cout << "GT()" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_ne_node(cdk::ne_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.NE(); std::cout << "NE()" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_eq_node(cdk::eq_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->left()->accept(this, lvl);
  node->right()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.EQ(); std::cout << "EQ()" << std::endl;
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_variable_node(cdk::variable_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  const std::string &id = node->name();
  auto symbol = _symtab.find(id);

  if (symbol->global()) {
    _pf.ADDR(symbol->name()); std::cout << "ADDR(symbol->name())" << std::endl;
  } else {
    _pf.LOCAL(symbol->offset()); std::cout << "LOCAL(symbol->offset())" << std::endl;
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_rvalue_node(cdk::rvalue_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->lvalue()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.LDINT(); std::cout << "LDINT()" << std::endl; // depends on type size
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_assignment_node(cdk::assignment_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->rvalue()->accept(this, lvl); // determine the new value
  _pf.DUP32(); std::cout << "DUP32()" << std::endl;
  if (new_symbol() == nullptr) {
    node->lvalue()->accept(this, lvl); // where to store the value
  } else {
    _pf.DATA(); std::cout << "DATA()" << std::endl; // variables are all global and live in DATA
    _pf.ALIGN(); std::cout << "ALIGN()" << std::endl; // make sure we are aligned
    _pf.LABEL(new_symbol()->name()); std::cout << "LABEL(new_symbol()->name())" << std::endl; // name variable location
    reset_new_symbol();
    _pf.SINT(0); std::cout << "SINT(0)" << std::endl; // initialize it to 0 (zero)
    _pf.TEXT(); std::cout << "TEXT()" << std::endl; // return to the TEXT segment
    node->lvalue()->accept(this, lvl);  //DAVID: bah!
  }
  _pf.STINT(); std::cout << "STINT()" << std::endl; // store the value at address
}


//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_evaluation_node(fir::evaluation_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  node->argument()->accept(this, lvl); // determine the value
  _pf.TRASH(node->argument()->type()->size()); std::cout << "TRASH(node->argument()->type()->size())" << std::endl;
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_print_node(fir::print_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  for (size_t ix = 0; ix < node->arguments()->size(); ix++) {
    auto child = dynamic_cast<cdk::expression_node*>(node->arguments()->node(ix));

    child->accept(this, lvl); // expression to print
    if (child->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_INT)) {
      _functions_to_declare.insert("printi");
      _pf.CALL("printi"); std::cout << "CALL('printi')" << std::endl;
      _pf.TRASH(4); std::cout << "TRASH(4)" << std::endl; // trash int
    } else if (child->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE)) {
      _functions_to_declare.insert("printd");
      _pf.CALL("printd"); std::cout << "CALL('printd')" << std::endl;
      _pf.TRASH(8); std::cout << "TRASH(8)" << std::endl; // trash double
    } else if (child->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_STRING)) {
      _functions_to_declare.insert("prints");
      _pf.CALL("prints"); std::cout << "CALL('prints')" << std::endl;
      _pf.TRASH(4); std::cout << "TRASH(4)" << std::endl; // trash char pointer
    } else {
      error(node->lineno(), "cannot print expression of unknown type");
    }
  }

  if (node->newline()) {
    _functions_to_declare.insert("println");
    _pf.CALL("println"); std::cout << "CALL('println')" << std::endl;
  }
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_read_node(fir::read_node * const node, int lvl) {
  /* ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  _pf.CALL("readi"); std::cout << "CALL('readi')" << std::endl;
  _pf.LDFVAL32(); std::cout << "LDFVAL32()" << std::endl;
  node->argument()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.STINT(); std::cout << "STINT()" << std::endl; */
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_while_node(fir::while_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  _whileIni.push(++_lbl);
  _whileEnd.push(++_lbl);
  
  _pf.LABEL(mklbl(_whileIni.top())); std::cout << "LABEL(mklbl(_whileIni.top()))" << std::endl;
  node->condition()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.JZ(mklbl(_whileEnd.top())); std::cout << "JZ(mklbl(_whileEnd.top()))" << std::endl;

  node->block()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.JMP(mklbl(_whileIni.top())); std::cout << "JMP(mklbl(_whileIni.top()))" << std::endl;

  _pf.LABEL(mklbl(_whileEnd.top())); std::cout << "LABEL(mklbl(_whileEnd.top()))" << std::endl;
  if (node->finally_block()) node->finally_block()->accept(this, lvl + 2);

  _whileIni.pop();
  _whileEnd.pop();
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_if_node(fir::if_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  int lbl1;
  node->condition()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.JZ(mklbl(lbl1 = ++_lbl)); std::cout << "JZ(mklbl(lbl1 = ++_lbl))" << std::endl;
  node->block()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.LABEL(mklbl(lbl1)); std::cout << "LABEL(mklbl(lbl1))" << std::endl;
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_if_else_node(fir::if_else_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  int lbl1, lbl2;
  node->condition()->accept(this, lvl);
  _pf.JZ(mklbl(lbl1 = ++_lbl)); std::cout << "JZ(mklbl(lbl1 = ++_lbl))" << std::endl;
  node->thenblock()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.JMP(mklbl(lbl2 = ++_lbl)); std::cout << "JMP(mklbl(lbl2 = ++_lbl))" << std::endl;
  _pf.LABEL(mklbl(lbl1)); std::cout << "LABEL(mklbl(lbl1))" << std::endl;
  node->elseblock()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _pf.LABEL(mklbl(lbl1 = lbl2)); std::cout << "LABEL(mklbl(lbl1 = lbl2))" << std::endl;
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_sizeof_node(fir::sizeof_node * const node, int lvl) {
  // TODO
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_leave_node(fir::leave_node * const node, int lvl) {
  if (_whileIni.size() >= (size_t)node->level()) {
    std::cout << "Hello there " << mklbl(_whileEnd.top() - node->level() + 1) << std::endl;
    _pf.JMP(mklbl(_whileEnd.top())); std::cout << "JMP(mklbl(_whileEnd.top()))" << std::endl; // jump to while end
  } else {
    error(node->lineno(), "'leave' outside while");
  }
  
  // TODO is this okay?
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_restart_node(fir::restart_node * const node, int lvl) {
  for (int i = 0; i < node->level(); i++) {
    if (_whileIni.size() != 0) {
      _pf.JMP(mklbl(_whileIni.top())); std::cout << "JMP(mklbl(_whileIni.top()))" << std::endl; // jump to while beginning
    } else {
      error(node->lineno(), "'restart' outside while");
    }
  }
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_return_node(fir::return_node * const node, int lvl) {
  // TODO
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_block_node(fir::block_node * const node, int lvl) {
  _symtab.push(); // for block-local vars
  if (node->declarations()) node->declarations()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  if (node->instructions()) node->instructions()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  _symtab.pop();
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_variable_declaration_node(fir::variable_declaration_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  
  auto id = node->identifier();

  // TODO remove this? 
  // std::cout << "INITIAL OFFSET: " << _offset << std::endl;

  int offset = 0, typesize = node->type()->size(); // in bytes
  // std::cout << "ARG: " << id << ", " << typesize << std::endl;
  if (_inFunctionBody) {
    // std::cout << "IN BODY" << std::endl;
    _offset -= typesize;
    offset = _offset;
  } else if (_inFunctionArgs) {
    // std::cout << "IN ARGS" << std::endl;
    offset = _offset;
    _offset += typesize;
  } else {
    // std::cout << "GLOBAL!" << std::endl;
    offset = 0; // global variable
  }
  // std::cout << "OFFSET: " << id << ", " << offset << std::endl;

  auto symbol = new_symbol();
  if (symbol) {
    symbol->set_offset(offset);
    reset_new_symbol();
  }

  if (_inFunctionBody) {
    // if we are dealing with local variables, then no action is needed
    // unless an initializer exists
    if (node->initializer()) {
      node->initializer()->accept(this, lvl);
      if (node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_INT) || node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_STRING) || node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_POINTER)) {
        _pf.LOCAL(symbol->offset()); std::cout << "LOCAL(symbol->offset())" << std::endl;
        _pf.STINT(); std::cout << "STINT()" << std::endl;
      } else if (node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE)) {
        if (node->initializer()->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_INT))
          _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;
        _pf.LOCAL(symbol->offset()); std::cout << "LOCAL(symbol->offset())" << std::endl;
        _pf.STDOUBLE(); std::cout << "STDOUBLE()" << std::endl;
      } else {
        error(node->lineno(), "cannot initialize");
      }
    }
  } else {
    if (!_function) {
      if (node->initializer() == nullptr) {
        _pf.BSS(); std::cout << "BSS()" << std::endl;
        _pf.ALIGN(); std::cout << "ALIGN()" << std::endl;
        _pf.LABEL(id); std::cout << "LABEL(id)" << std::endl;
        _pf.SALLOC(typesize); std::cout << "SALLOC(typesize)" << std::endl;
      } else {
        if (node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_INT) || node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE) || node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_POINTER)) {
          _pf.DATA(); std::cout << "DATA()" << std::endl;
          _pf.ALIGN(); std::cout << "ALIGN()" << std::endl;
          _pf.LABEL(id); std::cout << "LABEL(id)" << std::endl;

          if (node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_INT)) {
            node->initializer()->accept(this, lvl);
          } else if (node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_POINTER)) {
            node->initializer()->accept(this, lvl);
          } else if (node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE)) {
            if (node->initializer()->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE)) {
              node->initializer()->accept(this, lvl);
            } else if (node->initializer()->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_INT)) {
              cdk::integer_node *dclini = dynamic_cast<cdk::integer_node*>(node->initializer());
              cdk::double_node ddi(dclini->lineno(), dclini->value());
              ddi.accept(this, lvl);
            } else {
              std::cerr << node->lineno() << ": '" << id << "' has bad initializer for real value\n";
              _errors = true; // TODO check is this used?
            }
          }
        } else if (node->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_STRING)) {
          _pf.DATA(); std::cout << "DATA()" << std::endl;
          _pf.ALIGN(); std::cout << "ALIGN()" << std::endl;
          _pf.LABEL(id); std::cout << "LABEL(id)" << std::endl;
          node->initializer()->accept(this, lvl);
        } else {
          std::cerr << node->lineno() << ": '" << id << "' has unexpected initializer\n";
          _errors = true; // TODO check is this used?
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

//---------------------------------------------------------------------------

void fir::postfix_writer::do_function_declaration_node(fir::function_declaration_node * const node, int lvl) {
  // TODO
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_function_definition_node(fir::function_definition_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;
  
  if (_inFunctionBody || _inFunctionArgs) { //FIXME really needed?
    error(node->lineno(), "cannot define function in body or in arguments");
    return;
  }

  // remember symbol so that args and body know
  _function = new_symbol();
  _functions_to_declare.erase(_function->name()); // just in case
  reset_new_symbol();

  _currentBodyRetLabel = mklbl(++_lbl);

  _offset = 12;
  _symtab.push(); // scope of args

  if (node->arguments()) {
    _inFunctionArgs = true; //FIXME really needed?
    for (size_t ix = 0; ix < node->arguments()->size(); ix++) {
      cdk::basic_node *arg = node->arguments()->node(ix);
      if (arg == nullptr) break; // this means an empty sequence of arguments
      arg->accept(this, 0); // the function symbol is at the top of the stack
    }
    _inFunctionArgs = false; //FIXME really needed?
  }

  _pf.TEXT(); std::cout << "TEXT()" << std::endl;
  _pf.ALIGN(); std::cout << "ALIGN()" << std::endl;
  if (node->qualifier() == tPUBLIC) _pf.GLOBAL(_function->name(), _pf.FUNC()); std::cout << "GLOBAL(_function->name(), _pf.FUNC())" << std::endl;
  _pf.LABEL(_function->name()); std::cout << "LABEL(_function->name())" << std::endl;

  // compute stack size to be reserved for local variables
  frame_size_calculator lsc(_compiler, _symtab, _function);
  node->accept(&lsc, lvl);
  _pf.ENTER(lsc.localsize()); std::cout << "ENTER(lsc.localsize())" << std::endl; // total stack size reserved for local variables

  _offset = 0; // prepare for local variable

  _inFunctionBody = true;
  if (node->prologue()) {
    os() << "        ;; prologue " << std::endl;
    node->prologue()->accept(this, lvl + 4); // block has its own scope
  }
  if (node->block()) {
    os() << "        ;; block " << std::endl;
    node->block()->accept(this, lvl + 4); // block has its own scope
  }
  if (node->epilogue()) {
    os() << "        ;; epilogue " << std::endl;
    node->epilogue()->accept(this, lvl + 4); // block has its own scope
  }
  if (node->prologue()) {
    _symtab.pop();  // exit prologue scope
  }
  _inFunctionBody = false;

  _pf.LABEL(_currentBodyRetLabel); std::cout << "LABEL(_currentBodyRetLabel)" << std::endl;
  _pf.LEAVE(); std::cout << "LEAVE()" << std::endl;
  _pf.RET(); std::cout << "RET()" << std::endl;

  _symtab.pop(); // scope of arguments

  if (node->identifier() == "fir") {
    // declare external functions
    for (std::string s : _functions_to_declare)
      _pf.EXTERN(s); std::cout << "EXTERN(s)" << std::endl;
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_function_call_node(fir::function_call_node * const node, int lvl) {
  ASSERT_SAFE_EXPRESSIONS;

  auto symbol = _symtab.find(node->identifier());

  size_t argsSize = 0;
  if (node->arguments()) {
    if (node->arguments()->size() > 0) {
      for (int ax = node->arguments()->size() - 1; ax >= 0; ax--) {
        cdk::expression_node *arg = dynamic_cast<cdk::expression_node*>(node->arguments()->node(ax));
        arg->accept(this, lvl + 2);
        if (symbol->argument_is_typed(ax, cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE) && arg->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_INT)) {
          _pf.I2D(); std::cout << "I2D()" << std::endl;
        }
        argsSize += symbol->argument_size(ax);
      }
    }
  }
  _pf.CALL(node->identifier()); std::cout << "CALL(node->identifier())" << std::endl;
  if (argsSize != 0) {
    _pf.TRASH(argsSize); std::cout << "TRASH(argsSize)" << std::endl;
  }

  if (symbol->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_INT) || symbol->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_POINTER) || symbol->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_STRING)) {
    _pf.LDFVAL32(); std::cout << "LDFVAL32()" << std::endl;
  } else if (symbol->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_DOUBLE)) {
    _pf.LDFVAL64(); std::cout << "LDFVAL64()" << std::endl;
  } else if (symbol->is_typed(cdk::TYPE_VOID)) {
    // EMPTY
  } else {
    error(node->lineno(), "wrong type");
  }
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_null_node(fir::null_node *const node, int lvl) {
  // EMPTY
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_address_of_node(fir::address_of_node *const node, int lvl) {
  // TODO
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_index_node(fir::index_node *const node, int lvl) {
  // TODO
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_stack_alloc_node(fir::stack_alloc_node *const node, int lvl) {
  // TODO
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_prologue_node(fir::prologue_node *const node, int lvl) {
  _symtab.push(); // for block-local vars
  node->block()->accept(this, lvl + 2);
  // TODO scopes
}

void fir::postfix_writer::do_identity_node(fir::identity_node *const node, int lvl) {
  // TODO
}
